Simulation Module¶

class biosim.simulation.Biosim(island_map=None, initial_population=None, seed=None, img_dir=None, img_name='dv', img_fmt='png')[source]¶

Bases: object

build_dataframe()[source]¶

This method builds Pandas dataframes that are used in the visualization of the heat maps for carnivores and herbivores. The method builds a dictionary that is transformed into a main dataframe, that is turned into a map for each species.

make_movie(movie_fmt='mp4')[source]¶

Creates MPEG4 movie from visualization images saved. ..:note: Requires ffmpeg for MP4 and magick for GIF The movie is stored as img_base + movie_fmt

save_graphics()[source]¶

Save graphics with filename as given

set_animal_parameters(species, params)[source]¶
set_landscape_parameters(land, params)[source]¶
simulate(cycles=None, vis_steps=1, img_steps=None)[source]¶

This method performs the simulation. The method takes cycles to determine the length of the simulation, and then iterates through every cell on the island. This method also updates the visual graphs, so that the user can see the development. If the user want, this method can also save figures and create a video of these images and save that video to the disk.

update_carn_counter(carns)[source]¶

This method counts total number of carnivores on the island.

update_herb_counter(herbs)[source]¶

This method counts total number of herbivores on the island.
